# OptionExtensions.TapNoneAsync&lt;T&gt; method

Executes an asynchronous side effect if *option* is None, and returns *option* unchanged.

```csharp
public static Task<Option<T>> TapNoneAsync<T>(this Option<T> option, Func<Task> ifNone)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| T | A Some type. |
| option | An Option |
| ifNone | A Func to execute if *option* is None. |

## Return Value

*option*
